using System;
using System.Data;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Collections;
using System.IO;

/// <summary>
/// SysSample 领域类
/// </summary>
public class SysSampleDomain : DomainBase
{
	public SysSampleDomain()
	{
		table="SysSample";
	}
	/// <summary>
    /// 将实体对象转换为关系数据字典
    /// </summary>
    /// <param name="EntityBase">实体对象</param>
    /// <returns>数据字典</returns>
    protected override Dictionary<string, string> ConvertObjectToRecord(EntityBase EntityBase)
	{
		Dictionary<string, string> record = new Dictionary<string, string>();
		SysSampleEntity entity = EntityBase as SysSampleEntity;
		if (entity.Id!=null)
			record["Id"]=entity.Id;
		if (entity.Name!=null)
			record["Name"]=entity.Name;
		if (entity.Age!=null)
			record["Age"]=entity.Age;
		if (entity.Bir!=null)
			record["Bir"]=entity.Bir;
		if (entity.Photo!=null)
			record["Photo"]=entity.Photo;
		if (entity.Note!=null)
			record["Note"]=entity.Note;
		if (entity.CreateTime!=null)
			record["CreateTime"]=entity.CreateTime;
	    } 
}
